detail_desc: Lace underwired bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft bra top in lace and mesh and a pair of short lace shorts. Top with a V-neck, short butterfly sleeves and an elastic hem with a fastening and ties at the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist, scalloped hems and a lined gusset.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides of the legs.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides of the legs.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Waist-high hipster briefs in lace with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Corset in lace and mesh with an underwired bra that gives the bust a natural shape and provides light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Thong body in lace with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset and string back.
Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and ties at one side, 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim, and a frill trim at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length wrap dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, a seam with a tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Deck shoes in cotton canvas with imitation leather sections, elasticated lacing at the top and lacing details. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a wrapover with a frill trim down the front and to the hem. Seam at the waist with ties at the sides and long puff sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Sleeve pocket and side pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, visible, gathered seams down the back and sleeves, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Pile jacket with imitation leather details, a collar that can be turned up with an adjustable tab and metal buckle, a zip down the front and front pockets. Satin lining.

Push-up bra top in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Lace front and back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the front and at the neckline.
Long-sleeved jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, and buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, and buttoned cuffs.

Jacket in washed denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap front pockets with a concealed fastener and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Jacket in soft leather with a worn look. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Lined.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Shoulder tabs with a decorative press-stud, notch lapels with press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Chest pocket and side pockets with a zip, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in washed denim with a hood and sleeves in jersey. Lined, drawstring hood, buttons down the front and a yoke. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a text print, small embroidery detail at the front and a straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a text print, small embroidery detail at the front and a straight-cut hem.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back. Round neck with an opening at the top that fastens with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, long raglan sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams.

Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back. Round neck with an opening at the top that fastens with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, long raglan sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Oversized jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Long shirt dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, yoke and press-studs at the front and a flap chest pocket. Tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a rib knit with a sheen. Wrapover front with ties at the waist and long sleeves.
Calf-length dress in a rib knit with a sheen. Wrapover front with ties at the waist and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with fringes. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with fringes. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, calf-length dress in airy jersey with a deep neckline, seam at the waist and pleated skirt. Partly lined.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Straight, wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Straight, wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.

Long, pleated top in jersey with a sheen, with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Pleated trousers in jersey with a sheen, with an elasticated waist and slim legs that flare at the hems. Overlocked edges at the hems.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
